articles.author: Frank Corva
articles.description:
The speakers and performers at the second night of the America Loves Crypto tour were just as impassioned and driven to get out the crypto vote as those from the first night of the tour.
The political figures and crypto industry leaders present at this event, which took place at The Space in Las Vegas, included Sonny Vinuya, Outreach Director for Nevada Governor Joe Lombardo (R); Rudy Pimantuan, Nevada Lieutenant Governor Stavros S. Anthony’s Chief of Staff (R); Nevada State Treasurer Zach Conine (D) and Kate Rouch, Chief Marketing Officer (CMO) at Coinbase, amongst others. Rapper and singer 070 Shake and Las Vegas-based DJ 3LAU performed at the event.
The common threads in the rhetoric of the speakers and performers at the event were that crypto is here to stay, Nevada will be a home for …
articles.title: Nevada Welcomes Bitcoin and Crypto: Day Two of the America Loves Crypto Tour

articles.author: Matt Crosby
articles.description:
Bitcoin and the U.S. dollar have a long-standing inverse correlation, notably when observing the Dollar Strength Index (DXY). When the dollar weakens, Bitcoin often gains strength, and this dynamic might now be setting the stage for restarting the BTC bull cycle.
DXY
The Dollar Strength Index (DXY) measures the value of the U.S. dollar against a basket of other major global currencies. Historically, a declining DXY has often coincided with significant rallies in Bitcoin's price. Conversely, when the DXY is on the rise, Bitcoin tends to enter a bearish phase.
 
                         
                         
                        Figure 1: Bitcoin and DXY have historically been inversely correlated. View Live Chart 🔍 
                     
                    
We have recently seen a…
articles.title: Bitcoin's Potential Rally Amid U.S. Dollar Weakness

articles.author: Keshav Verma
articles.description:
An analytics firm has revealed that three altcoins have been seeing bearish bets on Binance, which may help fuel rebounds.
 
Tron, Stellar, And 1inch Have Seen Negative Funding Rates Recently
 
In a new post on X, the on-chain analytics firm Santiment has recently discussed the trend in the Binance Funding Rate for a few different altcoins.
 
 
The “Funding Rate” is an indicator that keeps track of the periodic amount of fees that the traders on a given derivatives exchange (which, in the current case, is Binance) are exchanging between each other.
 
When the metric has a positive value, it means the long contract holders are paying a premium to the short investors to hold onto their positions right now. Such a trend implies a bullish mentality is the dominant one in the market.
 
On the o…
articles.title: Binance Traders Are Aggressively Shorting These Altcoins, Rocket Fuel For Price Surge?

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
As we head into the final quarter of 2024, three meme coins are making waves in the cryptocurrency world: Dogecoin (DOGE), Shiba Inu (SHIB), and Mpeppe (MPEPE). These digital assets, fueled by community enthusiasm and innovative utility, have become favorites among crypto investors. With a potential rally on the horizon, these three cryptocurrencies are a must-hold in September for those seeking profits. Here’s why.
 
Dogecoin (DOGE): The Original Meme Coin Powerhouse 
Dogecoin (DOGE) has held its place as the original meme coin, gaining widespread attention due to its playful nature and backing from high-profile figures such as Elon Musk. Despite occasional price dips, Dogecoin (DOGE) remains a favorite among crypto enthusiasts because of its large community and enduring popularity. 
 
Se…
articles.title: Dogecoin, Shiba Inu (SHIB) & Mpeppe (MPEPE): 3 Cryptocurrencies You Must Hold In September For Profits

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
The meme coin market is constantly evolving, and recent trends show a significant shift as Shiba Inu (SHIB) and Dogecoin (DOGE) whales add Mpeppe (MPEPE) to their portfolios. While both DOGE and Shiba Inu (SHIB) have enjoyed massive success, Mpeppe (MPEPE)’s unique combination of decentralized finance (DeFi) and community-driven innovation has piqued the interest of major players. Top analysts believe Mpeppe (MPEPE) could become the next big thing in the world of cryptocurrencies. Here’s why SHIB and Dogecoin (DOGE) whales are holding onto Mpeppe (MPEPE).

articles.author: aisshwaryatiwari
articles.description:
Dallas-based United Texas Bank is the latest crypto-friendly bank to face a cease and desist order from the US Federal Reserve, according to a press release issued on September 4, 2024.
 
Federal Reserve Keeping A Close Eye On Bank’s Crypto Business
 
The US Federal Reserve has identified United Texas bank as having “significant deficiencies” in its dealings with crypto-based entities, including foreign correspondent banking and digital currency customers. 
 
Specifically, the Federal Reserve has raised concerns about United Texas Bank’s risk management systems, compliance with anti-money laundering (AML) rules and regulations, and the Bank Secrecy Act (BSA). Notably, the official order has not detailed how the bank fell short of achieving the required benchmarks, violating the compliance …
articles.title: Crypto-Friendly United Texas Bank Slapped With Cease And Desist Order By The US Federal Reserve
